<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">[Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 330 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1)

**Bloodlines**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=3), [Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=9), [Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

**Deities**
[Kerkamoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=140), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=15), [Set](/Deities.aspx?ID=242), [Sorrow's Sword](/Deities.aspx?ID=249)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 creature or unattended object
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You fire a green ray at your target. Make a spell attack. On a hit, you deal 12d10 damage, and the target must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. On a critical hit, treat the save result as one degree worse. A creature reduced to 0 HP is reduced to fine powder; its gear remains.

 An object you hit is destroyed (no save), regardless of Hardness, unless it's an [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=253) or similarly hard to destroy. A single casting can destroy no more than a 10-foot cube of matter. This automatically destroys any [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) construct, such as a [_wall of force_](/Spells.aspx?ID=363).

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d10.
name: Disintegrate
